Title: 39707 - # Ways Your Smartphone Can Help You Become a Better Musician
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 ways that a smartphone can help you become a better musician. You can discuss apps that can help those interested in becoming better at song writing, playing an instrument, producing music, etc. You can also discuss things like watching tutorials to learn anytime, anywhere while on your smart phone. Make sure to discuss apps and learning techniques that can be done from an Android phone, so that you can link to your target URL. Your placement site talks about technology so write for a tech-minded audience, who might also be interested in working on their musical skills.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: playing the guitar on T-Mobile's LG G5
